title: Nam Manglak Spritzer Recipe
full_text:
Nam Manglak Spritzer Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cups
sparkling water
2
teaspoons
basil seed
3
tablespoons
honey
, or to taste
1
teaspoon
rose water
1/2 to 1
teaspoon
lime juice
, to taste
Directions
Divide sparkling water into two glasses, then basil seed. Stir well to coat basil seeds with water until jelly-like coatings form. Stir in honey, rosewater, and lime juice to taste. Serve with crushed ice.
